mapper.insert: insert into user (bizNo, corpName, pw, lati, longi, phoneNo, sectors) values ( #{bizNo}, #{corpName}, #{pw}, #{lati}, #{longi}, #{phoneNo}, #{sectors})
insert into united_board (bizNo, name, addr, phoneNo, temp, regdate) values ( #{bizNo}, #{name}, #{addr}, #{phoneNo}, #{temp}, now() )
mapper.select: select * from user where bizNo = #{bizNo} and pw = #{pw}
select * from united_board where bizNo = #{bizNo} and regdate = curdate()
